Package com.bytedesk.ai.springai.mcp_server

Class McpServerRestController

java.lang.Object
com.bytedesk.core.base.BaseRestController<McpServerRequest,McpServerRestService>
com.bytedesk.ai.springai.mcp_server.McpServerRestController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/v1/mcp/server") @Description("McpServer Management Controller - Content mcpServer management and categorization APIs") public class McpServerRestController extends BaseRestController<McpServerRequest,McpServerRestService>
